channel.title: How to get mining that doesn't stop after one ore

item.title: How to get mining that doesn't stop after one ore
item.dc:creator: @mr_eak mr eak
item.description:
@mr_eak wrote:

Hey im trying to get so when i mining an ore (ess) it keeps mining after

heres the code im using now, yes i know its says elemental rock but its not

		case 3403:
			// elemental rock
				pEmote = 0x554;
			mining[0] = 1;
			mining[1] = 1;
			mining[2] = 5;
			mining[4] = 1436;
			break;

so how do i make it mine nonstop?

Read full topic
item.source: How to get mining that doesn't stop after one ore
